TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextFieldParser extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
.class public auto ansi TextFieldParser extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供分析结构化文本文件的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for parsing structured text files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TextFieldParser` 对象提供用于分析结构化文本文件的方法和属性。The `TextFieldParser` object provides methods and properties for parsing structured text files. 使用 `TextFieldParser` 分析文本文件类似于遍历文本文件，而用于提取文本字段的 `ReadFields` 方法类似于拆分字符串。Parsing a text file with the `TextFieldParser` is similar to iterating over a text file, while the `ReadFields` method to extract fields of text is similar to splitting the strings. `TextFieldParser` 可以分析两种类型的文件：带分隔符或固定宽度。The `TextFieldParser` can parse two types of files: delimited or fixed-width. 某些属性（如 `Delimiters` 和 `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes`）仅在处理带分隔符的文件时才有意义，而 `FieldWidths` 属性只有处理固定宽度的文件时才有意义。Some properties, such as `Delimiters` and `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` are meaningful only when working with delimited files, while the `FieldWidths` property is meaningful only when working with fixed-width files. 下表列出了涉及 `Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser` object. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文本文件中读取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度文本文件中读取Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| |从具有多种格式的文本文件中读取Read from a text file with multiple formats|[如何：读取具有多种格式的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 此示例分析以制表符分隔的文本文件，`Bigfile`。This example parses through a tab-delimited text file, `Bigfile`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的 `TextFieldParser` 对象以分析 `stream` 参数表示的文件或流。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. > [!CAUTION] > 使用特定的区域性设置编译一组字符并使用不同的区域性设置检索这些相同的字符时，这些字符可能无法可解释，并且可能会导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The stream to be parsed.

param.name: defaultEncoding
param.span: 在无法从文件确定编码时要使用的字符编码。

span.span: The character encoding to use if encoding is not determined from file.
Default is .

param.name: detectEncoding
param.span: 指示是否在文件头查找字节顺序标记。

span.span: Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the file.
Default is .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的 `TextFieldParser` 对象以分析 `stream` 参数表示的文件或流。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. 如果 `True``detectEncoding` 参数，此构造函数将尝试通过查看文件或流的前三个字节来检测编码。If the `detectEncoding` parameter is `True`, this constructor attempts to detect the encoding by looking at the first three bytes of the file or stream. 如果文件以适当的字节顺序标记开头，则它会自动识别 UTF-8、小字节序 Unicode 和大字节序 Unicode 文本。It automatically recognizes UTF-8, little-endian Unicode, and big-endian Unicode text if the file starts with the appropriate byte-order marks. 否则，将使用 `defaultEncoding` 指定的编码。Otherwise, the encoding specified by `defaultEncoding` is used. > [!CAUTION] > 使用特定的区域性设置编译一组字符并使用不同的区域性设置检索这些相同的字符时，这些字符可能无法可解释，并且可能会导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: or is .
cannot be read from.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 定义注释标记。

span.span: Defines comment tokens.

summary.span: 注释标记是一个字符串，当位于行首时，指示该行是一个注释并且分析器应该忽略该行。

span.span: A comment token is a string that, when placed at the beginning of a line, indicates that the line is a comment and should be ignored by the parser.

value.span: 一个字符串数组，它包含 对象的所有注释标记。

span.span: A string array that contains all of the comment tokens for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 "**全部**" 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 长度为零的注释标记将被忽略。Zero-length comment tokens are ignored. ## Examples 此示例为 `TextFieldParser`指定，应忽略以单引号（'）开头的 `FileReader` 行。This example specifies that for the `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader` lines beginning with a single quotation mark (') should be ignored. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

span.span: A comment token includes white space.

summary.span: 定义文本文件的分隔符。

span.span: Defines the delimiters for a text file.

value.span: 一个字符串数组，它包含 对象的所有字段分隔符。

span.span: A string array that contains all of the field delimiters for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 `FieldType.Delimited`时，此属性才有意义。This property is meaningful only if the property is set to `FieldType.Delimited`. 还可以使用 方法来定义文本文件的分隔符。Defining the delimiters for a text file can also be accomplished with the method. 下表列出了涉及 `Delimiters` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `Delimiters` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文本文件中读取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例指定 `TextFieldParser` 对象的分隔符 `FileReader`为逗号（，）。This example specifies that the delimiter for the `TextFieldParser` object, `FileReader`, is a comma (,). [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

exception.span: 分隔符值设置为换行符、空字符串或 。

span.span: A delimiter value is set to a newline character, an empty string, or .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndOfData As Boolean
public: property bool EndOfData { bool get(); };

summary.span: 如果在当前光标位置到文件末尾之间没有非空、非注释行，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if there are no non-blank, non-comment lines between the current cursor position and the end of the file.

value.span: 如果没有更多可供读取的数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there is no more data to read; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从文件读取时，可以使用此属性来确定要读取的数据的结尾。This property can be used when reading from files to determine the end of the data being read. 下表列出了涉及 `EndOfData` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `EndOfData` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度的文件读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用 `EndofData` 属性，通过 `TextFieldReader``FileReader`循环遍历文件中的所有字段。This example uses the `EndofData` property to loop through all the fields in the file with the `TextFieldReader`, `FileReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 返回导致最近发生的 异常的行。

span.span: Returns the line that caused the most recent exception.

value.span: 导致最近发生的 异常的行。

span.span: The line that caused the most recent exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未引发 异常，则返回空字符串。If no exceptions have been thrown, an empty string is returned. 属性可用于显示导致异常的行号。The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. 下表列出了涉及 `ErrorLine` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ErrorLine` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度的文件读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用 `ErrorLine` 属性来显示导致当前 异常的行。This example uses the `ErrorLine` property to display the line causing the current exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回导致最近发生的 异常的行的行号。

span.span: Returns the number of the line that caused the most recent exception.

value.span: 导致最近发生的 异常的行的行号。

span.span: The number of the line that caused the most recent exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未引发 异常，则返回-1。If no exceptions have been thrown, -1 is returned. 属性可用于显示导致异常的行号。The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. 在确定行号时，不会忽略空行和注释。Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number. 下表列出了涉及 `ErrorLineNumber` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ErrorLineNumber` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度的文件读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用 `ErrorLineNumber` 属性来显示导致当前 异常的行的位置。This example uses the `ErrorLineNumber` property to display the location of the line causing the current exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <int> ^ FieldWidths { cli::array <int> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <int> ^ value); };
member this.FieldWidths : int[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 表示正在分析的文本文件中每一列的宽度。

span.span: Denotes the width of each column in the text file being parsed.

value.span: 一个整数数组，它包含正在分析的文本文件中每一列的宽度。

span.span: An integer array that contains the width of each column in the text file that is being parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 `FieldType.FixedWidth`时，此属性才有意义。This property is meaningful only if the property is set to `FieldType.FixedWidth`. 如果数组中的最后一项小于或等于零，则认为该字段的宽度是可变的。If the last entry in the array is less than or equal to zero, the field is assumed to be of variable width. 方法还可用于设置字段宽度。The method can also be used to set field widths. 下表列出了涉及 `FieldWidths` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `FieldWidths` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从固定宽度文本文件中读取Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例读取 `ParserText.txt`的文件，并指定宽度;第一列的宽度为5个字符，第二列是10，第三个为11，第四列的宽度是可变的This example reads the file `ParserText.txt`, specifying the widths; the first column is 5 characters wide, the second is 10, the third is 11, and the fourth is of variable width [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

exception.span: 除数组最后一个条目外的任意位置中的宽度值小于或等于零。

span.span: A width value in any location other than the last entry of the array is less than or equal to zero.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 指示在分析分隔的文件时是否用引号将字段括起来。

span.span: Denotes whether fields are enclosed in quotation marks when a delimited file is being parsed.

value.span: 如果将字段用引号括起来，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if fields are enclosed in quotation marks; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 "**全部**" 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 如果该属性 `True`，则分析器会假定字段用引号（""）引起来，并且可以包含行尾。If the property is `True`, the parser assumes that fields are enclosed in quotation marks (" ") and may contain line endings. 如果字段用引号引起来，例如 `abc, "field2a,field2b", field3` 并且此属性 `True`，则用引号引起来的所有文本都将按原样返回;此示例将返回 `abc|field2a,field2b|field3`。If a field is enclosed in quotation marks, for example, `abc, "field2a,field2b", field3` and this property is `True`, then all text enclosed in quotation marks will be returned as is; this example would return `abc|field2a,field2b|field3`. 如果将此属性设置为 `False`，则此示例将返回 `abc|"field2a|field2b"|field3`。Setting this property to `False` would make this example return `abc|"field2a|field2b"|field3`. ## Examples 此示例将 `myReader`的 `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` 属性设置为 `True`。This example sets the `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` property to `True` for `myReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Long
public: property long LineNumber { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)

summary.span: 返回当前行号，如果流中没有更多字符，则返回 -1。

span.span: Returns the current line number, or returns -1 if no more characters are available in the stream.
The current line number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 "**全部**" 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 在确定行号时，不会忽略空行和注释。Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number. ## Examples 此示例在文本文件中搜索名称 "."，并报告出现的行。This example searches for the name "Jones" in the text file and reports what line(s) it occurs on. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

related.span: 对象 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string PeekChars(int32 numberOfChars) cil managed
Public Function PeekChars (numberOfChars As Integer) As String
.method public instance string PeekChars(int32 numberOfChars) cil managed

span.span: The number of characters to read.
Required.

summary.span: 读取指定数目的字符但不前移光标。

span.span: Reads the specified number of characters without advancing the cursor.

returns.span: 包含读取的指定数量的字符的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the specified number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `numberOfChars` 值必须小于该行中的字符总数。The `numberOfChars` value must be less than the total number of characters in the line. 如果不是，则 `PeekChars` 返回的字符串将被截断为行的长度。If it is not, the string returned by `PeekChars` will be truncated to the length of the line. 将忽略空行。Blank lines are ignored. 不返回行尾字符。End-of-line characters are not returned. `PeekChars` 方法不执行分析;分隔字段内的行尾字符被解释为行的实际结尾。The `PeekChars` method performs no parsing; an end-of- line character within a delimited field is interpreted as the actual end of the line. 下表列出了涉及 `PeekChars` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `PeekChars` method. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |在分析字段之前确定字段的格式Determine the format of a field before parsing it|[如何：读取具有多种格式的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用 `PeekChars` 来查找数据的末尾，并在该位置停止分析文件。This example uses `PeekChars` to find the end of the data and stop parsing the file at that point. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] ReadFields() cil managed
.method public instance string[] ReadFields() cil managed

summary.span: 读取当前行的所有字段，以字符串数组的形式返回这些字段，并将光标前进到包含数据的下一行。

span.span: Reads all fields on the current line, returns them as an array of strings, and advances the cursor to the next line containing data.

returns.span: 包含当前行的字段值的字符串数组。

span.span: An array of strings that contains field values for the current line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使用户能够分析多种格式的文本文件，`ReadFields` 方法会检查 `TextFieldType`、`Delimiters`和 `FieldWidths`的值（如果指定了这些值），每次调用时都是如此。In order to allow users to parse text files in multiple formats, the `ReadFields` method examines the values of `TextFieldType`, `Delimiters`, and `FieldWidths`, if they are specified, each time it is called. 用户需要根据需要正确地配置 `TextFieldType` 和 `FieldWidths` 或 `Delimiters` 属性。Users need to correctly configure the `TextFieldType` and `FieldWidths` or `Delimiters` properties, as appropriate. 如果 `TextFieldType` 设置为 `Delimited`，并且未设置 `Delimiters`，或者如果 `TextFieldType` 设置为 `FixedWidth` 和 `FieldWidths`，则会引发异常。If `TextFieldType` is set to `Delimited`, and `Delimiters` is not set, or if `TextFieldType` is set to `FixedWidth` and `FieldWidths`, an exception is thrown. 如果 `ReadFields` 遇到空白行，将跳过这些行并返回下一个非空行。If `ReadFields` encounters blank lines, they are skipped and the next non-blank line is returned. 如果 `ReadFields` 方法无法分析当前行，则会引发异常，并且不会移动到下一行。If the `ReadFields` method cannot parse the current line, it raises an exception and does not move to the next line. 这使应用程序能够再次尝试分析该行。This enables your application to attempt to parse the line again. 下表列出了涉及 `ReadFields` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ReadFields` method. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度的文件读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用 `ReadFields` 方法从以逗号分隔的文件 `ParserText.txt`读取。This example uses the `ReadFields` method to read from the comma-delimited file `ParserText.txt`. 此示例将字段写入 `Testfile.txt`。The example writes the fields to `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 不能使用指定格式分析字段。

span.span: A field cannot be parsed by using the specified format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ReadLine() cil managed
.method public instance string ReadLine() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)

summary.span: 将当前行作为字符串返回，并将光标前进到下一行。

span.span: Returns the current line as a string and advances the cursor to the next line.
The current line from the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadLine` 方法不执行分析;分隔字段内的行尾字符被解释为行的实际结尾。The `ReadLine` method performs no parsing; an end-of-line character within a delimited field is interpreted as the actual end of the line. 如果到达了文件的末尾，则返回 `Nothing`。`Nothing` is returned if the end of the file is reached. ## Examples 此示例读取 `ParserText.txt` 的文件，并将其写入 `Testfile.txt`。This example reads through the file `ParserText.txt` and writes it to `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 如果 `Testfile.txt` 不存在，则由 `WriteAllText` 方法创建。If `Testfile.txt` does not exist, it is created by the `WriteAllText` method. 此示例将字段作为单个字符串写入;若要使每行显示在目标文件中各自的行上，应在每行的末尾追加一个 `VbCrLf` 字符。This example writes the fields as a single string; to have each line display on its own line in the destination file, a `VbCrLf` character should be appended at the end of each line.

related.span: 对象 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

span.span: Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ReadToEnd() cil managed
.method public instance string ReadToEnd() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)

summary.span: 读取文本文件的其余部分并作为一个字符串返回。

span.span: Reads the remainder of the text file and returns it as a string.

returns.span: 文件或流中的其余文本。

span.span: The remaining text from the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 "**全部**" 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 如果没有更多要读取的内容，因为已达到文件的末尾，则返回 `Nothing`。If there is nothing more to read because the end of the file has been reached, `Nothing` is returned. `ReadToEnd` 方法不会忽略空白行和注释。The `ReadToEnd` method does not ignore blank lines and comments. ## Examples 此示例使用 `ReadToEnd` 方法 `ParserText.txt` 读取整个文件，并将其写入 `Testfile.txt`文件中。This example uses the `ReadToEnd` method to read the entire file `ParserText.txt` and write it to the file `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 如果 `Testfile.txt` 不存在，则由 `WriteAllText` 方法创建。If `Testfile.txt` does not exist, it is created by the `WriteAllText` method.

related.span: 对象 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

related.span: 使用 TextFieldParser 对象分析文本文件

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
System.ParamArray

span.span: Array of type .

summary.span: 将读取器的分隔符设为指定的值，并将字段类型设为 。

span.span: Sets the delimiters for the reader to the specified values, and sets the field type to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此方法后，将清除 `Delimiters` 属性的现有内容。The existing contents of the `Delimiters` property are cleared when this method is set. 此方法提供了一种方法来设置分隔符，而无需创建数组。This method provides a way to set delimiters without creating an array. 下表列出了涉及 `SetDelimiters` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `SetDelimiters` method. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |分析文本文件Parse a text file|[使用 TextFieldParser 对象分析文本文件Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/parsing-text-files-with-the-textfieldparser-object.md)| ## Examples 此示例将打开一个文本字段分析器，并将分隔符定义为 `vbTab`。This example opens a text field parser and defines the delimiter as `vbTab`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 将路径 `C:\logs\test.log` 替换为要分析的文件的路径和名称。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse.

span.span: A delimiter is zero-length.

summary.span: 将读取器的分隔符设置为指定值。

span.span: Sets the delimiters for the reader to the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了此选项，则会清除 `Delimiters` 属性的现有内容。The existing contents of the `Delimiters` property are cleared when this is set. 此方法提供了一种方法来设置分隔符，而无需创建数组。This method provides a way to set delimiters without creating an array. 下表列出了涉及 `SetFieldWidths` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists example of tasks involving the `SetFieldWidths` method. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |分析文本文件。Parse a text file.|[使用 TextFieldParser 对象分析文本文件Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/parsing-text-files-with-the-textfieldparser-object.md)| ## Examples 此示例将打开一个文本字段分析器，并将字段宽度定义为 `5`。This example opens a text-field parser and defines the field width as `5`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 将路径 `C:\logs\test.log` 替换为要分析的文件的路径和名称。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse. 下面的示例打开一个文本字段分析器，并将字段宽度定义为 `5`、`10`和变量。The following example opens a text-field parser and defines the field widths as `5`, `10`, and variable. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#13)] 将路径 `C:\logs\test.log` 替换为要分析的文件的路径和名称。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 `TextFieldParser` 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the `TextFieldParser` instance is cast to an interface. 建议的替代项是调用 方法。The recommended alternative is to call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType TextFieldType { Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 指定要分析的文件是分隔的还是固定宽度的。

span.span: Indicates whether the file to be parsed is delimited or fixed-width.

value.span: 一个 值，它指示要分析的文件是分隔的还是固定宽度的。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the file to be parsed is delimited or fixed-width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为分隔。The default value of this property is delimited. 下表列出了涉及 `TextFieldType` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `TextFieldType` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文本文件中读取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度文本文件中读取Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| |从具有多种格式的文本文件中读取Read from a text file with multiple formats|[如何：读取具有多种格式的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 此示例将创建一个 `TextFieldParser``FileReader`，并将其指定为分隔。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and specifies that it is delimited. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#19)] 此示例将创建一个 `TextFieldParser``FileReader`，并将其指定为固定宽度。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and specifies that it is fixed-width. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#20)]
